indicator_name: Proportion of domestically generated resources allocated by the government directly to poverty reduction programmes
target_name: Ensure significant mobilization of resources from a variety of sources, including through enhanced development cooperation, in order to provide adequate and predictable means for developing countries, in particular least developed countries, to implement programmes and policies to end poverty in all its dimensions
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals compilation of previous metadata
other_info: This, or part of this, indicator is awaiting the development of internationally established methodology and standards (classified by the UN as tier 3).
page_content: No data was sourced for this indicator
data_notice_text: This indicator was deleted following indicator changes from the United Nations 2020 Comprehensive Review.
